document.full_text: new orleans residents were found to have three times the rate of heart attacks four years after the devastation of hurricane katrina than before the storm and levee break that flooded the city, according to a study presented at a major heart meeting on sunday.
document.title: post-katrina heart attack rate three-times higher: study
lines_and_colors: new orleans residents were found to have three times the rate of heart attacks four years after the devastation of hurricane katrina than before the storm and levee break that flooded the city, according to a study presented at a major heart meeting on sunday.
